catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 228
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: six richly painted scenes: couple sitting close at R with approaching figure; male and female sitting across from one another in small structures; female figure in stylized rickshaw with male figure nearby; two male figures fighting; male figure at end with sword and open fan
title: Six No and Kyogen Pieces
